name: Black Forest Smoothie
description: Decadent cherries and chocolate make you feel like you're drinking cake for breakfast. Not only are they sweet and sour and all kinds of delicious, cherries are also jam packed with anti-inflammatories, antioxidants for healthy cells, and vitamins like Vitamin C to support a strong immune system!

ingredients.name: frozen cherries or your favorite berries (raspberries, cherries or strawberries)
Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend or Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend

preparation: In a blender, combine all ingredients until smooth.
tips: If you like it thicker, blend with ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water.
If youâ€™re opting for vanilla protein blend, add 1 tsp of unsweetened cocoa powder to the smoothie so you can still get that smooth chocolatey flavour.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole-grain bread and 2 tsp nut butter.
